attributes.action: INVESTIGATE " THE SHORTER WORKING WEEK UNION FUND "
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE UNIONS IN 1989 COLLECTED MONEY FOR A SHORTER WORKING WEEK FUND THIS MONEY IS SAID TO BE WORTH £15 MILLION AND IS SITTING IN A BANK . IT SHOULD BE GIVEN TO CHARITY OR USED TO THE WISHES OF THE MEMBERS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
